verses.name: Judges 18:3
verses.text: When they were by the house of Micah, they knew the voice of the young man the Levite: and they turned in thither, and said unto him, Who brought thee hither? and what makest thou in this place? and what hast thou here?

verses.name: Judges 18:4
verses.text: And he said unto them, Thus and thus dealeth Micah with me, and hath hired me, and I am his priest.

verses.name: Judges 18:5
verses.text: And they said unto him, Ask counsel, we pray thee, of God, that we may know whether our way which we go shall be prosperous.
